items.title: Crypto Brokers
items.text: Offer your clients an opportunity to trade and deposit many different cryptocurrencies.

items.title: Crypto Exchanges (CEX)
items.text: The core mechanism behind every exchange. Our gateway provides the technology to handle all your crypto transactions.

items.title: Converters
items.text: Provide your clients with an ability to convert their crypto to any of the accepted currencies. Our solution offers user-friendly interface and industry leading exchange rates!

items.title: Mobile Wallet Apps
items.text: Coinsbuy can be easily integrated with any mobile app. Offer your clients a way to securely store cryptocurrencies, tokens and stablecoins.

items.title: Margin Exchanges
items.text: Allow your clients to make spot purchases and sales of cryptocurrencies using margin. Coinsbuy has all the functionality needed to implement it!

items.title: Multi-Asset Brokers
items.text: Add crypto as an additional asset to your platform as well as allow your clients a way to top up their accounts with crypto!
